## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCSN2, COP12, CSN2, FUS12</u>
- **Gene Name:** CONSTITUTIVE PHOTOMORPHOGENIC 12, FUSCA 12
- **Description:**   proteasome family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2059289
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
